response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This exceptional item is not just a product; it's an investment in quality and excellence. Given its unique features and the time and resources dedicated to its creation, we believe it's worth more than $15,000. For you, the potential buyer, this could be a valuable addition to your collection or a significant asset for your business. Considering the high demand and scarcity of this product, I propose a special introductory offer of $18,000. This price reflects the true value and exclusivity of what we have to offer. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can discuss the details further.", "product_price": 18000}
